test_message: Draft a warranty claim email for a Samsung Galaxy S21 purchased on 2024-01-15 with invoice ID INV-2024-001 from Amazon. The phone's battery is draining rapidly within 2 hours of full charge.

result.subject_line: Warranty Claim Request - Galaxy S21 - Invoice INV-2024-001
result.email_body: Dear Customer Support, I am writing to formally lodge a warranty claim for my Samsung Galaxy S21, which I purchased on 2024-01-15 from Amazon with invoice ID INV-2024-001. Unfortunately, the product is experiencing a rapid battery drain within 2 hours of a full charge. Under the Consumer Protection Act 2019, I am entitled to a remedy for this defect and kindly request a repair, replacement, or refund. I have attached a copy of the invoice for your reference. Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response. Sincerely, [Customer Name]

product_details.issue_description: Battery draining rapidly within 2 hours of full charge
